mapper.insert: /* USE : ProdKitchenprintLinkMapper.linkedPrter */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRINTER_PROD USING DUAL ON ( STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND PRTER_NO = #{prterNo} AND PROD_CD = #{prodCd} ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( STORE_CD, PRTER_NO, PROD_CD, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{storeCd}, #{prterNo}, #{prodCd}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
mapper.select:
/* USE : ProdKitchenprintLinkMapper.getGroupProdList */ SELECT thp.PROD_CD, thp.PROD_NM FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp WHERE thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thp.PROD_CD NOT IN (SELECT PROD_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRINTER_GROUP_PROD thpgp WHERE thpgp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND PRINTER_GROUP_CD = #{printerGroupCd})
AND thp.REG_DT BETWEEN #{startDate}||'000000' AND #{endDate}||'235959'
AND thp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%' --상품코드
AND thp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%' --상품명
AND thp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} CONNECT BY PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD = P_PROD_CLASS_CD AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ) --상품분류
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_BARCD WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND PROD_CD = thp.PROD_CD AND BARCD_CD = #{barCd} ) --바코드
AND thp.HQ_BRAND_CD = #{hqBrandCd} --브랜드코드
AND thp.USE_YN = #{useYn} --사용여부
AND thp.PROD_TYPE_FG = #{prodTypeFg} --상품유형
--메뉴그룹 AND thp.PROD_CD IN (SELECT PROD_CD FROM TB_HQ_STORE_PROD_GROUP_DTL WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND STORE_GROUP_CD = #{storeGroup})
AND ( ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) != 0) AND (thp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN (SELECT HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) ) OR ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) = 0) AND 1=1 ) ) ORDER BY thp.PROD_CD ASC
mapper.insert: /* USE : ProdKitchenprintLinkMapper.saveProdMapping */ INSERT INTO TB_HQ_PRINTER_GROUP_PROD ( HQ_OFFICE_CD, PRINTER_GROUP_CD, PROD_CD, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{hqOfficeCd}, #{printerGroupCd}, #{prodCd}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
mapper.select: /* USE : ProdKitchenprintLinkMapper.getPrinterMapping */ SELECT thpgsp.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, thpgsp.PRTER_NO, tmp.PRTER_NM FROM TB_HQ_PRINTER_GROUP_STORE_PRINT thpgsp, TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_MS_PRINTER tmp WHERE thpgsp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thpgsp.PRINTER_GROUP_CD = #{printerGroupCd} AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thpgsp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tms.STORE_CD = thpgsp.STORE_CD AND tmp.STORE_CD = thpgsp.STORE_CD AND tmp.PRTER_NO = thpgsp.PRTER_NO ORDER BY thpgsp.STORE_CD, thpgsp.PRTER_NO

/* USE : ProdKitchenprintLinkMapper.getPrinterList */ SELECT tms.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tmp.PRTER_NO, tmp.PRTER_NM FROM TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_MS_PRINTER tmp WHERE tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tmp.STORE_CD = tms.STORE_CD AND tms.STORE_CD || tmp.PRTER_NO NOT IN (SELECT STORE_CD || PRTER_NO FROM TB_HQ_PRINTER_GROUP_STORE_PRINT WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND PRINTER_GROUP_CD = #{printerGroupCd}) ORDER BY tms.STORE_CD, tmp.PRTER_NO
